extendedInfo.description: Sms wishes is an application to schedule sms on list of contact. You put a date and an hour, sms will be send to selected contacts. You have also a repeat option to send every day or every monday...To see release notes go to http://s.diotasoft.com/smswishes

reviews.comment: Great SMS scheduler with enough options and a good improved interface than before. Could definitely use a better name though.. like Deferred SMS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: the ui is too convoluted
reviews.comment: The ui is too confusing for me and its missing google voice support. switched to titan message scheduler!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app... Flexible and it helps if u need to send periodic messages for whatever. I used it for parking and saved fines :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Out of business
reviews.comment: Used to work on Android 2.2 but after 2.3 update just force closes. Optimus 2x.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hijacked system, had to reboot. Didn\'t do anything at all, just flashed to foreground constantly. Crap. Droid 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I emailed the developer about the force close issue before leaving a negative rating. I neverheard back. Was once my favorite app; now it is useless!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung NOTE SGH-i717 - Android Ver 4.0.4
reviews.comment: This app will crash the phone every time. Google Play states this app works with the Samsung NOTE, This is not the case. Major work needs to be done to this app and GOOGLE PLAY should list this app as Unknown for all devices until community comments show problems areas have been fixed.
reviews.author: Phillip Laws

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: It\'s pissin me off now cause I use dis app everyday now it keeps foreclosing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does the job, but update slowed application down and interface looks worse. \302\253galaxy s\302\273
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: after install, test work but take up memory thay affect the notification bar cannot pull down. uninstalled then work. good but need improve. galaxy s
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5* if u can do the folowing.allow group txts select from contcts. Allow group txt to be one thread. And remember selected groups on exit. Then perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dev should consider putting \"Enable\" toggle switch at BOTTOM of the list of data values - to not hv to scroll BACK UP to top of list to enable! TKU!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I schedule all my friends and family\'s bdays as well as happy holiday greetings. Makes me look good!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was good.
reviews.comment: Started out great. Then always force closes right after I type the message. Would be nice if can copy history.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app on my G1 for a year now with no complaints at all! This is so much better than the calendar for appointment reminders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: FCs in gingerbread. Great app, need to be able to use it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: WORKS PERFECT! I schedule txt msgs at like 3 am to txt my girlfriend, telling her i couldnt sleep thinking of her.. but i was sleeping.works everytime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I use to love it,
reviews.comment: but now the date and time won\'t change and forces the app to close. Fix this!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: bummer
reviews.comment: hasn\'t worked since update to Android os but was great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It you b great if the delivery report feature was included. If so I would give 5 Star\'s.
reviews.author: A Google User
